TableView.name: VIEW_SMP10_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP10_PMM" ("DATA", "UF", "SMP", "SMP_A", "SMP_B") AS
WITH ufs AS
(SELECT uf.* FROM uf),
dias AS
(SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE),'MM/yyyy') data FROM dual
UNION
SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE - (Level*30)),'MM/yyyy') FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
ufs_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM ufs r, dias d),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo as
(select data, uf, campo_39, campo_40 from view_smp10_smp11_dados),
dados_x_pmm AS
(
select tab.data,
ufs.uf,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(campo_39, 0))), '0') AS campo_39,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(campo_40, 0))), '0') AS campo_40
from
(
SELECT distinct Tab.DATA AS Data,
uf.nome as uf
FROM dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN ufs uf on uf.nome = tab.uf
) ufs,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo tab
where tab.uf = ufs.uf
and tab.data = ufs.data
GROUP BY Tab.DATA,
ufs.uf
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.nome as uf,
CASE
WHEN dados.campo_40 = '0'
AND dados.campo_39 != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.campo_40 = '0'
AND dados.campo_39 = '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.campo_40 != '0'
AND dados.campo_39 = '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND((dados.campo_39 * 100 / dados.campo_40), 2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS smp,
nvl(campo_39,'0') as smp_a,
nvl(campo_40,'0') as smp_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
ufs_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.nome = dados.uf(+)
and reg.data = dados.data (+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.uf,
CASE
WHEN dados_finais.smp != '0,00'
AND TO_NUMBER(dados_finais.smp) > 100
THEN '100,00'
ELSE replace(dados_finais.smp,'.',',')
END AS smp,
smp_a,
smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3;
TableView.layoutSQL: Select * From dual
